text:
The ImmutableFloat.getUnitRepresentation return "es" instead of "ex".
This was discovered by going CSSRule.toString().
The problem is caused because the ImmutableFloat's static array of UNITS has the string "es" instead of "ex" in index 3.
creator: richard.zschech@cqrdata.com

text: Fixed in the new CSS engine.
creator: hillion@apache.org
